name: Tap Shooter
description:
Play against a friend on the same keyboard! Tap, mash or smash to out-shoot your buddy, and out last the war!

This game was a 'self-jam' style development, where I gave myself 40 hours (a single working week, over the course of a few weekends) to build a simple game. The game will not undergo any further development, except bugfixes.

How To Play:

Player 1: W/S to choose ship, Spacebar to shoot

Player 2: Up/Down to choose ship, Enter to shoot
